original_text: At the mouth of two witnesses, or three witnesses, shall he that is worthy of death be put to death; but at the mouth of one witness he shall not be put to death.
korean_text: 죽일 자를 두 사람이나 세 사람의 증언으로 죽일 것이요 한 사람의 증언으로는 죽이지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: At the mouth of two witnesses
shall he that is worthy of death be put to death
but at the mouth of one witness
he shall not be put to death
